qa.question: Describe how you would use Excel to track monthly expenses and visualize spending trends.
qa.answer: I would create a table with categories and months, use SUMIFS to total expenses, and insert a line chart to visualize trends.

eval.feedback: Good use of SUMIFS and charts. Could mention PivotTables for more flexibility.
